text: Jughead and Betty may be openly in love on Riverdale, but Cole Sprouse and Lili Reinhart are far less forthcoming about their rumored real - life romance. That doesn't mean fans can't read into every single tweet, Instagram post, and interview that comes from the Riverdale duo to make a case that they are totally and utterly in love IRL. Check out this timeline of their rumored relationship below! December 17, 2018 Lili knows that she found herself a real catch in Cole Sprouse, and she's not afraid to let the world know too.
